name: The Forest (itch) (🐝)
description:
You're a newly Turned vampire who just bit some poor university student. Big Bummer.

Featuring...

  • 3k+ words :)
  • (sorta) 2 endings
  • very sussy code
  • lots of second hand embarassment
  • 1 amongus scrunkle
  • 2 people who look very similar

*This is very experimental; the story is meant to be lighthearted and is mostly a way for us to explore how to use RenPY!*
